verses.verse: Stand <S%G4739>firm<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> in the <S%G1657>liberty<s%> by <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G1659>made<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1659>free,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G1758>be<s%> <S%G1758>entangled<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> with a <S%G2218>yoke<s%> of <S%G1397>bondage.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yes,<s%> I <S%G3143>testify<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> who receives <S%G4059>circumcision,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G3781>debtor<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3551>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>law.<s%>

You are <S%G2673>alienated<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2673>you<s%> who <S%G3748>desire<s%> to be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%> You have fallen away <S%G1601>from<s%> <S%G5485>grace.<s%>
You were <S%G5143>running<s%> <S%G2573>well!<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G348>interfered<s%> with <S%G5209>you<s%> that you <S%G3982>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3982>obey<s%> the <S%G1465>truth?<s%>

<S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G5426>will<s%> <S%G5426>think<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1161>way.<s%> But he <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G5015>troubles<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> will <S%G941>bear<s%> <S%G3588>his<s%> <S%G3748>judgment,<s%> <S%G302>whoever<s%> he <S%G5600>is.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1473>I,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2784>I<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> am <S%G1377>I<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G1377>persecuted?<s%> <S%G686>Then<s%> the <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> block of the <S%G4716>cross<s%> <S%G2673>has<s%> been <S%G2673>removed.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5210>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> were <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1657>freedom.<s%> <S%G3440>Only<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> use your <S%G1657>freedom<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G874>gain<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> be <S%G1398>servants<s%> to one <S%G240>another.<s%>

But I <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5055>you<s%> <S%G3756>won't<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5055>fulfill<s%> the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1937>lusts<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> are <S%G480>contrary<s%> to one <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4160>you<s%> may <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3739%G99999>that<s%> you <S%G2309>desire.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you are <S%G71>led<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> you <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

<S%G5355>envyings,<s%> <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G3178>drunkenness,<s%> <S%G2970>orgies,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5125>things<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G3739>these;<s%> of which I <S%G4302>forewarn<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G4302>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G4277>I<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4277>forewarned<s%> <S%G3754>you,<s%> that those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4238>practice<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%> <S%G2816>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
